name: WizarDroid
tagline: A lightweight Open Source Android library for creating step by step wizards
body:
![WizarDroid logo](http://s16.postimg.org/5zo7z6ib5/wizardroid_icon.png) *WizarDroid* is a lightweight Open Source Android library developed by [CodePond.org](http://www.codepond.org) that addresses a feature that Android is surprisingly missing, **Wizards**. If you reached this page, rest assured **THERE IS NO BUILT-IN WIZARD SUPPORT IN ANDROID** (as of writing this page). [Learn more](https://github.com/Nimrodda/WizarDroid/wiki).

### Usage Advantages
*    Wizard's flow is defined in one place and can be maintained easily
*    Step context is persistent and passed between steps automatically using reflection
*    Simple and consistent API for controlling wizard's flow in runtime

### Technical Overview
WizarDroid is built on top of Android's [Fragments](http://developer.android.com/guide/components/fragments.html) and is compatible with *Android API 9+* using Android [Support Library](http://developer.android.com/training/basics/fragments/support-lib.html). [Learn more](https://github.com/Nimrodda/WizarDroid/wiki).
